column4: Hello. I was just trying out wireshark. Can that capture packets only from the system its running on, or any system on the LAN?
system its running on.  Unless you arp poison the other computer on the lan
What do you mean by arp poison? Is there something I need to install on the other PC?
no you could actually use an ARP attack and put yourself in the middle of the other lan machine and the hub/router
